title: (每日一篇)學生JJ英文作文求狠評

replies.msg:
Introduce your city(town)

I am living in Hong Kong ,the city that never sleeps .Hong Kong was colonized by the British before 1997.People living in Hong Kong was hopeful for their future in 90’s .They would love to helping each other and Hong Kong was industrial diverse. After the transfer of sovereignty to China in 1997. The colonisation was started by china which is One-way Permit politics.It is affecting the local Hong Kong people in different ways including housing and price of commodity and that cause the dislike to this politics. And the government was overlook bad influences the migrant from China was causing . The widespread discontent among the local people of Hong Kong was rapidly spreading. However, the government of HK handles it with draconian measures. The government of HK turns their people down for begging to China .People in Hong Kong is being depressed for their government and feel hopeless for their future . The city I am living is dying and this is the introduction of Hong Kong.

利申:英文白痴 但好想學好
此回覆已被刪除

Grammar: 4
Contents: 4
Organization: 2 (poor paragraphing)

Some salient points:

"I am living in Hong Kong ,the city that never sleeps ."

It sounds unnatural. A more fluent way:

"I live in Hong Kong, a robust metropolis."


Thank you very much.

industrial係adj，應該唔可以放喺 diverse前面，用adv , would love to helping 都有問題，to 唔跟gerund

利申：dse考生，只係當proofread 做，非專業意見

industrial係adj，應該唔可以放喺 diverse前面，用adv , would love to helping 都有問題，to 唔跟gerund

利申：dse考生，只係當proofread 做，非專業意見

多謝你覆我
你岩 to我明啊 咁前邊我應該點講 diverse industry ？

"I am living in Hong Kong ,the city that never sleeps ."

此回覆已被刪除

I am living in Hong Kong ,the city that never sleeps .Hong Kong was colonized by the British before 1997.People living in Hong Kong was hopeful for their future in 90’s .They would love to helping each other and Hong Kong was industrial diverse. After the transfer of sovereignty to China in 1997. The colonisation was started by china which is One-way Permit politics.It is affecting the local Hong Kong people in different ways including housing and price of commodity and that cause the dislike to this politics. And the government was overlook bad influences the migrant from China was causing . The widespread discontent among the local people of Hong Kong was rapidly spreading. However, the government of HK handles it with draconian measures. The government of HK turns their people down for begging to China .People in Hong Kong is being depressed for their government and feel hopeless for their future . The city I am living is dying and this is the introduction of Hong Kong.


認真答
post之前可唔可以執下d標點符號同統一返啲格式先（Hong Kong / HK), 好難睇

生字幫唔到你，就算我比字你，你唔識靈活運用都係死（例：draconian 同整篇文章好唔夾）
文法就好多小問題，感覺上你都無乜點proofread過

篇文係介紹你住嘅城市，如果唔知仲以為香港變咗北韓
仲要咁集中係政府問題上，咁點叫introduction呀

Grammar: 4
Contents: 4
Organization: 2 (poor paragraphing)

Some salient points:

"I am living in Hong Kong ,the city that never sleeps ."

It sounds unnatural. A more fluent way:

"I live in Hong Kong, a robust metropolis."


Grammar: 3

Human stupidity is infinite then.

正所謂on9無極限

連貫性低 例如 第一句介紹香港係不夜城之後就講回歸前後係點點點
d句子都有沙石
頭尾兩句都有d奇怪
應該都係坐3望4既
點解咁多人話好 完全句與句唔知講緊乜
香港人helpful同香港係diverse industry有咩關係？點解會係同一句講？

點解咁多人話好 完全句與句唔知講緊乜

邊有人話好

點解咁多人話好 完全句與句唔知講緊乜

邊有人話好

Contents 比4 啵

點解咁多人話好 完全句與句唔知講緊乜

邊有人話好

Contents 比4 啵

一個人咋喎

噴青文
不夜城之後就講殖民好，但又無講點好，得兩三句，跟住就回歸講中國
篇文嘅 tense 要consistent 啲，依樣加埋其他唔連貫/通暢嘅問題睇到我好辛苦

想我地跟咩syll？跟DSE啦
錯d好簡單既grammar係好礙眼
結構唔知做咩 當你隨心作 judge唔到
冇content 都係當你隨心作 所以judge唔到

但grammar:3/7左右
此回覆已被刪除
請注意singular同plural nouns

I am living in Hong Kong ,the city that never sleeps .Hong Kong was colonized by the British before 1997.People living in Hong Kong was hopeful for their future in 90’s .They would love to helping each other and Hong Kong was industrial diverse. After the transfer of sovereignty to China in 1997. The colonisation was started by china which is One-way Permit politics.It is affecting the local Hong Kong people in different ways including housing and price of commodity and that cause the dislike to this politics. And the government was overlook bad influences the migrant from China was causing . The widespread discontent among the local people of Hong Kong was rapidly spreading. However, the government of HK handles it with draconian measures. The government of HK turns their people down for begging to China .People in Hong Kong is being depressed for their government and feel hopeless for their future . The city I am living is dying and this is the introduction of Hong Kong.

生字幫唔到你，就算我比字你，你唔識靈活運用都係死（例：draconian 同整篇文章好唔夾）
文法就好多小問題，感覺上你都無乜點proofread過

下次會執番 老師好少講錯邊到 只會話啲文法有錯 我到而家都唔知一直錯緊乜
